controller

Class CanvasController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.CanvasController

  • public class CanvasController
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String arc_no_target_id
      when for a new arc, a target has not been selected yet, then it is already added as arc (and displayed as a red line) and its id will be stored here.
      static boolean cleanUpCanvasAfterRepaint
      if set to true, the cleanupCanvas() function will be called once on the next repaint.
      static int FIGURE_ARC 
      static int FIGURE_LABEL 
      static int FIGURE_PLACE 
      static int FIGURE_TRANSITION 
      static java.lang.Double PETRINET_PADDING
      the padding in pixel, that will be added to the petriNetSize when a new canvas size is computed.
      static java.lang.Double PETRINET_PADDING_BASE 
      static boolean selectionKeyActive
      stores, if the keyboard button, used for adding elements to an existing selection, is currently being pressed.

      • PETRINET_PADDING_BASE

        public static final java.lang.Double PETRINET_PADDING_BASE

      • PETRINET_PADDING

        public static java.lang.Double PETRINET_PADDING
        the padding in pixel, that will be added to the petriNetSize when a new canvas size is computed.

      • cleanUpCanvasAfterRepaint

        public static boolean cleanUpCanvasAfterRepaint
        if set to true, the cleanupCanvas() function will be called once on the next repaint. Needed to cleanUp instantly after a petriNet has been loaded from a pnml-file.

      • selectionKeyActive

        public static boolean selectionKeyActive
        stores, if the keyboard button, used for adding elements to an existing selection, is currently being pressed.

      • arc_no_target_id

        public static java.lang.String arc_no_target_id
        when for a new arc, a target has not been selected yet, then it is already added as arc (and displayed as a red line) and its id will be stored here.

      • addToGridReferencePoint

        public static void addToGridReferencePoint(java.awt.geom.Point2D p)
        adjusts the reference point from which the grid will be painted, to create the illusion of a static grid.
        Parameters:
        p - - the x/y amount by which the reference point will be adjusted

      • addFigure

        public static void addFigure(BaseFigure figure,

        add a figure element to the figures HashMap in Canvas and to the corresponding ids List.

        public static void mouseMoved(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        mouseMoved event handler. Stores current mouse position. Needed for arcs with no selected target.

        e - the MouseEvent.
